as you look down at the thing a tached to your wrist you noticed that it looked like a dueldisk from yugioh 5ds except that it is costumized into a fire red robotish/devilish. when you finaly look around the disk, you realise that there are cards in the deck spot. before you get a chance to look at them to you feal something enteryour body, in about a secound you feel aful and that you want to destroy somthing and a deskapears infront of you. deciding that you would like to smash it out of rage a shining light comes from your arm and it appears to expel a dark liquid that apears to slither to the edge near the white thing and turns into you. you feel that you have some thing left behined as you feal a twitch at the edge of your back around your tailbone.noticing how close the white light has gotten from where you last saw it you start paniking howeverwhen it gets closer you notice that it apears to be a duel runner except it has a big red button on the front of the screen. when you sit down put the dueldisk in the slot and push the button the duel runner turns into one that seems costumized like the dueldisk."awesome!"you say. 111.content: by waking up you realise that you have slept on your duel runner. deciding to get up and strech you realise that this is leo and lunas living room from yugioh 5ds. "wowwwwwwwwwww!" you say as pain erupts from you right arm. however after stumbaling backwards into a chest the pain subsides and is replaced by a strange comfort "what the" is all the words you can say before you heare a boy say
111.title: at leo and lunas house

1112.content:
You spin around to see a rather confused, angry and slightly frightened Leo, with his Duel Disk active. Oh, quiznak.

"HOW DID YOU GET IN OUR HOUSE?!"

You raise your hands, trying to defuse the situation slightly. "I-I can explain!" Good quiznaking going, genius.

"Yeah, right! I've got your explanation: Yuou're a thief! Get out, or I'll school you in a Duel!" Leo yelled back, clearly not happy.

You activate your own Duel Disk, but before you can Duel, Luna grabs Leo from behind, distracting him.

"Wha!? Hey! Sis, letmego!"

"Leo, calm down!"

"He's a thief! Here's here to nick our stuff, and I'm gonna teach him a lesson!"

"Nothing's been touched, Leo! Just calm down!"

Ah, siblings and their fights. They reminded you of your older siblings back home.......

"What's going on here!?" The door suddenly swung open to reveal another familiar face......!
1112.title: "how did you get hear?!"

112.content:
.....in pitch blackness.

''What th-'' you cry. You try to move your arms and head, but they're stuck, so you flail your legs about. Suddenly, you till sideways and start rolling, until you hit something with a loud clang!

Great. Stuck in a trashcan. Well, at least you can get out.

It takes a bit of effort and some fancy footwork, you manage to extract yourself from the can. Then you check yourself for trash. You don't find any nasty trash on you, the ground or the can, thankfully, but you find a bunch of bashed up booster packs. Score! Save them for later.

Get: 5x Bashed Up Booster Packs

You look around next. It looks like you're in a dead-end alleyway, a rather clean one at that. The buildings are made of well painted, nice smooth stone, with a few doors here and there. There old boxes full of metal parts, and a small chest tucked away in the corner...''waitwhat? A metal chest?'' you ask, confused. You decide to investigate this chest, so you head over and open it. Inside, is.....

Hey, isn't that the Duel Disk that was on your arm in that duel before? How'd it get here?
You check your arm. Weirdly enough, it's bare. On instinct, you decide to take the Duel Disk and attach it your arm.
It fits perfectly! It even has a deck in it already! "SCORE!" you yell with glee.

Get: Gekitosu Duel Disk
Nova Dragon Theme Deck

Before you can check the deck, though, you hear someone address you.

"Huh? Hey, you! Turn around and show your face!"

Crud. You slowly stand up and turn around. From the entrance of the alleyway, you can see........."N-no way!"
It's-
112.title: Trashy man and introductions?

1121.content:
It's....Yusei Fudo?!
As soon as he sees your face, he seems to recognise you. “Oh, good. You’re okay. You looked like you were hurt back there.”

“N-no, I’m alright...thanks for worrying, though....” you reply, starstruck.
He takes a moment to reply. “....you sure you’re alright? You don’t need to act like you’re not hurt, that was a mighty big crash back there. No-one would blame you for injuring yourself.” Yusei asked you.
“.....Crash?” You respond. What crash?
He shrugs, a bit confused. “Here, come have a look. Might jog your memory.” He beckons you over to where he’s standing. Curious, you walk over to him, to see a interesting sight.
“Oh. That crash.” Is your response to the scene in front of your eyes. There’s a Duel Runner, one that looks very much like the one in that void, rammed into one of the roadside newspaper shops, on a angle. I guess you were driving the Duel Runner, you swerved or something and hit the newspaper stand, and you got sent flying into that trash can. “Now I remember. I’m...not all that injured. I ended up head first in a empty trash can, so the trash can must have saved me from any major injuries.” You half explained, half made up, feeling slightly embarrassed.
“Head first in a trash can, huh?” Yusei repeats back to you. “Well, I’ve seen worse, and and the important thing is, you’re not serverly injured. Your Duel Runner, on the other hand.....” he trailed off, looking at the wreak in front of him. The poor Duel Runner...! The entire front section of the Duel Runner was bent and crumpled, the only thing relatively unbent being the front wheel. The whole thing was smoking, and it didn’t look like it would be easy, or cheap to fix. What should you do?
Improv, of course.
“Ohh....Ahhh, shoot! And I was hoping to just pass through here, and not have to stop for much.....I was making good time, too!” You skim off the top of your head, sagging your head and shoulders in upset.
Yusei looks at you, a bit confused. “Pass though here....You’re a traveller, huh? What’re you travelling for?” He asked you.
Time for a bit more improv. A convincing coverup story can save your time and your life. And you would definitely need a coverup story with what was happening right now. “Yeah, I’m a traveller. Just riding around Japan to find myself. What about you, Y....I didn’t get your name..?” You don’t say much, for fear of slipping up again. You were lucky that you caught your slip up quickly, that could have gotten weird and bad fast.
“....Yusei. Yusei Fudo. If you really want to know, I run a repair shop in Downtown Neo Domino. You look like you could use a mechanic right now, actually.” He replies, with a bit of jealousy in his voice.
“Yeah, I could.....” You mutter, before pausing for a moment. “Can you-“

His response is simple, yet laced with some cheek(considering his background, and what you adlibbed so far, it’s kinda deserved).
1121.title: Crash Witness

12.content:
I looked down and saw a pure onyx black duel disk on my arm,'a duel disk, huh?' i thought as that troublesom speck of light drew nearer,'Well,ok let's see what or who you are.' As the light became blinding i took up a stance that bespoke flight or fight,i was in essence playing chicken with a duel runner.'Please stop,please stop,please stop!' I thought over and over,hopping that this duelist wouldn't run me down.Suddenly i heard tires screech,"you alright ,kid?"
a young man asked as he stepped off and came towards me,it was only then that i noticed that i was shaking my stance was gone.
"Y-yes I'm fine." I replied trying to keep my cool and not freak out.
"why didn't you move?" he asked he was right beside me now,he smelled of fuel and faintly of sweat,it smelled nice to me for some reason.
"I-I coudn't," I replied and that was the truth,"it felt like some thing was holding me." i was shaking really hard now,the guy placed his arm around me,"it's alright," he whispered,"do you live aroud here?"
"no,i was in my home asleep, and the i woke up and i was here," i replied,"I don't even know where i am."
he was silent for a moment before saying,"you're in the satalite."
Satalite? then that meant this was...
"who are you?"
"yusei,"he replied,"and you are?"
i knew it,"my name's raven." I said
12.title: An odd duel disk

121.content:
In the subway he meets yusei friends they ask him where he came from
He looks at his extra deck and has a dragon he never had before
121.title: his home

1211.content:
2800 attack 2500 def lv 8 effect synchro

When battling a lv 4 or lower monster you gain life point equal to half the destroyed monsters atk
1211.title: Holy eyes slash dragon

12111.content:
"I woke up here." you tell Yuesi's friends, which are just Crow and his caretaker, Martha, who was currently preparing something for you to eat, more than likely soup. Jack has probably left already for the city, with Yuesi's bike and all.

"Just dumped here, huh?" Crow's reply is fast. "Well, you need a few things if you're to survive here. A set of tough clothes, a bit of fighting skill, along with knowing how to Duel as well."

"What are you implying?" You reply incredulously.

Crow's response is curt. "That you look like an idiot."

"Crow, please, cut Raven some slack." Yusei chimed in from across the table you three were currently seated. "They have no clue how they got here, but that doesn't immediately make them a bad Duelist." His faith in you warms you. "They're missing a chunk of their memories, not all of it."

"I'm just saying, pajamas don't mix well with a cheap hoodie, socks and boots." Crow is right about that. You guess that you were woken up by something and went looking for what it was before you got...transported? Teleported? Yoinked? Okay, maybe not the last one.

"And you think we look any better?" Yusei responds with a small smile.

"Least I'm properly dressed." Crow muttered before facing you. "Okay, so how much Dueling experience do you have?"

You think a bit before responding. "I know the basics, but I only have a limited grasp on strategy. The Duel Disk says otherwise, but I just picked it up off the ground."

"You have a deck to go with that disk?" Yusei asked.

"Yep." The Duel Disk had formed with a deck included. It was full of Level 4 monsters and useful generic spells, along with some famous spell cards from Yugioh's early years. "It won't brick, at least."

"Lack of confidence will get you nowhere." Yusei replied. It stung you a bit, for some reason. But then again... "But as long as you have a deck, you can get by. No card is worthless. That's what I believe."

"Anyway, there's something serious that needs addressing...." declared Crow, before eh turned to face you with a look of bewilderment plain on his face. "Are you a boy or a girl, because that long hair is confusing the hell outta me."

You facepalm.
12111.title: Introductions.

choices: It’s Jack! I thought he was gone already?
121111.content:
“I’m a girl, Crow.” You say, annoyed. He raises his hands up defensively. “Okay, okay. Like I said, I was confused. So....what are you going to do now?”

“Um....” Crow’s question makes you stop and think for a bit. You genuinely have no idea what you’re going to do now. You could explore Satellite, but that might end up angering someone you’re supposed to...you decide to answer truthfully. “I....don’t know.”

“I’m not surprised.” Yusei pipes in. “A lot of people aren’t too sure what to do at first here.” “I can see why....” You reply understandably. “But there aren’t that many attractions around here, to be honest.” Crow decides to pop in a joke. You give a small, humourless laugh at that. “Okay, so that one was bad. But really, we just try and make a living here and survive. Course, some of us, espically the jackels...” Crow begins talking about some of the kids he keeps an eye Aoi, but you’re only half listening as you think of what to do.

As you think on what to do, Maritha finishes cooking and comes out with the food. As you expected, it’s soup. She pours into some chipped bowls and hands them to us. Grabbing a spoon, me and Crow dig in. Yusei, however, blows on his and begins speaking. “Once we’ve eaten, we’ll show Raven around the area. All right with you, Crow?” “Fine by mEEEEEEOOOOOWWWWWCCHHHHHH! Argh!” In his haste to respond, Crow burnt his tongue on the hot soup. You can’t help but giggle at this.

Just then, the door swings open. The person that steps through it was someone you weren’t expecting.
121111.title: You're a girl.

choices: Hoodie with black Jeans and black boots
Black jacket with yellow shirt blue Jean's and black boots
121112.content:
I'm a boy man your an idiot crow you know that

Yusei Anyway let's go find some clothes

2 outfit ideas
